title: [GAMEPLAY] Sejuani's Boar Makes Annoying Sound Even When Dead
body: I just played a game against a sej and the while game when i get near her the boar was making a annoying noise when while dead idk if this is a bug or you guys just made the boar always be making noise

replies.body: I've had that before too. Fucking annoying as hell

Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! This certainly isn't intended. Lemme follow up with the Champion team. ^-^
